name: Please Remain Seated!
description:
Please Remain Seated was made for our GAM130 Module of this teams' 1st year of University.

Prologue

You are a history student with strict instructions to “please remain seated!” until you complete your classwork. 

Bored, you get sucked into a fantastical, goofy daydream where you must navigate Pendennis Castle in a rolling chair in order to finish your essay!

Controls - Keyboard and Mouse:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Jump: "Space"
  • Pause: ESC

Controls - Controller:

  • Move: Left Stick
  • Jump: "X / A"
  • Pause: Options / Menu
